text.section: to change the principal office of the corporation;
to elect officers required by this chapter to be elected by the stockholders or directors and to fill vacancies in any such offices;
to change the number of the board of directors and to fill vacancies in the board of directors;
to remove officers or directors from office;
to authorize the payment of any dividend or distribution to shareholders;
to authorize the reacquisition for value of stock of the corporation; or
to authorize a merger pursuant to section eighty-two or section eighty-three.
